titles.title: Rightsizing Pension Premiums Act of 2017
Rightsizing Pension Premiums Act of 2017
To amend the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to adjust single-employer premiums, and for other purposes.
Rightsizing Pension Premiums Act of 2017

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce, and in addition to the Committees on Rules, and the Budget, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
